link.title: Juniata Valley Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Governor Wolf has announced the closure of school for the remainder of the current school year. The Juniata Valley School District will continue to provide Review and Enrichment activities. Please continue to visit the District Website for announcements and updates.

img.alt: Photo of a banner that says "remote learning center".

div.a: The remote learning center is now active, please click on this link for access.

div.p: our header gallery is currently not working with the remote learning center link. Please click here to access the remote learning center.
Want to stay up to date on the latest information from Juniata Valley? Download our School Pointe Stay Connect app from the IOS or Google Play store today!
